snippet: The owner of a driving school in Sunset Park, Brooklyn, used a hidden camera to help a student pass the written examination for a commercial license, federal prosecutors said.
abstract: The owner of a driving school in Sunset Park, Brooklyn, used a hidden camera to help a student pass the written examination for a commercial license, federal prosecutors said.

headline.main: Driving School Owners Charged in Test Cheating Scheme
headline.print_headline: Two Charged In Plot to Help Driver Cheat On an Exam
